I am a photographer based out of New York who enjoys photographing still/moving life and things.
Some of my specialties are getting photographs of sunrises, and getting photos of snowy enviroments.
Most of my previous clients were satisfied with the photos they got on the first try, and all were satisfied with photos from any reshoots.
If you want to hire me for a photo shoot, please check out my requests page.


My camera specs (Nikon D700):

  • 12.1 megapixel sensor
  • ISO 200 - 6400
  • 5 FPS continuous
